Pregunta: During PI planning, Agile Teams estimate user stories using story points. What estimation technique is commonly used to estimate Epics in SAFe?
What is one method for designing the end-to-end Customer experience?
What question helps Product Management in creating a Vision?
Respuesta Dada: What problem(s) will the Solution solve?
Respuesta Correcta: What problem(s) will the Solution solve?

Pregunta: What is one method to establish a team's velocity?
Respuesta Dada: Add the Story points for all Features completed in the Iteration
Respuesta Correcta: Compare the average Story points completed throughout the previous Iterations.

Pregunta: What is the primary purpose of the Continuous Exploration (CE) process in SAFe?
Respuesta Dada: Discover, explore new product opportunities and identify emerging business and technical trends
Respuesta Correcta: Discover, explore new product opportunities and identify emerging business and technical trends

Pregunta: Which tool shows dependencies during PI planning?
What is one influence on Solution and PI Roadmaps?
Which statement describes an owned ART PI Risk?
Respuesta Dada: There is a strategy to adjust the plan as necessary
Respuesta Correcta: Someone has taken the responsibility of the risk

Pregunta: What is one role of Product Management?
Respuesta Dada: Managing and prioritizing the Team Backlog
